theUnchainedMod:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theUnchainedMod:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theUnchainedMod:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

theUnchainedMod:BalletShoes.NAME: Ballet Shoes
theUnchainedMod:BalletShoes.FLAVOR: Impossible to strike a bad pose with these.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn with Momentum, gain enough Momentum for the next Swirl.

theUnchainedMod:RustedChains.NAME: Rusted Chains
theUnchainedMod:RustedChains.FLAVOR: These used to hold you to a prison wall. Now they are handy tools.
DESCRIPTIONS: The seventh card you play each combat costs zero.

theUnchainedMod:HeartOfTheUnderdog.NAME: Heart of the Underdog
theUnchainedMod:HeartOfTheUnderdog.FLAVOR: You feel it beat stronger whenever the odds are stacked against you.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn, gain 1 Strength if you do not have more block than ALL enemies..

theUnchainedMod:Carabiner.NAME: Carabiner
theUnchainedMod:Carabiner.FLAVOR: There is no better tool for connecting chains.
DESCRIPTIONS: Chains no longer wear off at the end of turn.

theUnchainedMod:PolishedChains.NAME: Polished Chains
theUnchainedMod:PolishedChains.FLAVOR: You can see your own reflection in these.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yRusted #yChains. Every seventh card you play each combat costs zero.

theUnchainedMod:BrokenCharm.NAME: Broken Charm
theUnchainedMod:BrokenCharm.FLAVOR: Ringing it doesnt make the most pleasant of sounds, but it has emotional value.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your first 3 turns, gain #y

theUnchainedMod:Churros.NAME: Churros
theUnchainedMod:Churros.FLAVOR: These tasty treats fill you with a burst of energy.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card that applies a Chain you play each turn, is played twice.

theUnchainedMod:Memento.NAME: Memento
theUnchainedMod:Memento.FLAVOR: The demon awakens when the tide of battle turns.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time the block of an enemy is broken each turn, gain [E] .

theUnchainedMod:TotemOfPain.NAME: Totem Of Pain
theUnchainedMod:TotemOfPain.FLAVOR: When you listen close, you can hear the demon whisper: 'Sharing is caring'.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, hit an enemy for ALL Relayed Damage you gained since last turn.

theUnchainedMod:DancingRibbons.NAME: Dancing Ribbons
theUnchainedMod:DancingRibbons.FLAVOR: It reminds you of merry times spent dancing in the tavern hall
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn add a Swirl into your hand, if you played a Swirl this turn.

theUnchainedMod:Wrench.NAME: Wrench
theUnchainedMod:Wrench.FLAVOR: You can never fasten your armor tight enough.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply Crushed Armor, the enemy loses #y5 HP.
